column2: "I don't know how I'm supposed to get up the courage to drink these things by myself when I don't know what's in them."
"I'd be a lot happier about it if I was drinking with a buddy."
"Could you take a moment to try one with me? If they're serving it here on the ship, it's probably OK."
"The Medical Center just always worries me..."
"...Alright, I think I've built up some nerve. Well then, bottoms up!"

"At the Medical Center, you can purchase and drink a \"Buff Drink\" which will have an effect during your next quest.

Buff Drinks have two effects: A \"Main Effect\" which always occurs, and a \"Sub Effect\" which occurs at random.

There are 3 stages of Main Effect: \"Large\", \"Medium\" and \"Small\", one of which occurs randomly."

"When you have met certain conditions, you can accept Client Orders from Lola which unlock new kinds of drink when completed.

You will be able to purchase items with stronger effects, so try to be proactive in accepting Client Orders.

Lola is in front of the Medical Center in the Gate Area, Central Hall."
